reviewText: i ordered twice and this cd is about someone else
This DVD should be recalled: it appears that due to some manufacturing error it contains a different subject (Zimbabwean dictator Robert Mugabe).
I also got the dvd of an african dictator.  I watched the entire dvd, thinking 'maybe Ceausescu will be next' but that didn't happen.  Cover says Ceausescu as well as the dvd.

They sent me a product with an african dictator, an African country.
Amazon hired guys with only one digit IQ, and no wonder they don;t know where Romania is, since over the phone they asked where Los Angeles is located (state) ....
